name: Dragon Deity of Destruction, Gyze
effect:
[AUTO]:When placed on (VC), choose five <Zeroth Dragon> from your bind zone, and call them to separate (RC).

[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your turn, deal one damage to your opponent's vanguard for each <Zeroth Dragon> on your (RC).

name: Neon Gyze
effect:

[AUTO][Generation Break 1]:When placed on (GC), [COST][choose a face down [G Guardian] from your G zone, and turn it face up], choose one of your rear-guards, and you may put it into your soul. This unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle for every two of your open circles.

name: Medical Studies of Extinction, Vincent
effect:
[G Guardian]-Opponent Turn's Guard Step-[COST][Choose a card with "[Heal] Heal" from your hand, and discard it] Call this card to your (GC) from face down.
